verses.verse: He that is wounded in the <S%H6481>stones<s%>, or hath his privy <S%H8212>member<s%> cut <S%H3772>off<s%>, shall not <S%H935>enter<s%> into the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

A <S%H4464>bastard<s%> shall not <S%H935>enter<s%> into the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; even to the <S%H6224>tenth<s%> <S%H1755>generation<s%> shall none of his <S%H935>enter<s%> into the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

An <S%H5984>Ammonite<s%> or a <S%H4125>Moabite<s%> shall not <S%H935>enter<s%> into the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; even to the <S%H6224>tenth<s%> <S%H1755>generation<s%> shall none belonging to them <S%H935>enter<s%> into the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>ever<s%>:

because <S%H1697><s%> they <S%H6923>met<s%> you not with <S%H3899>bread<s%> and with <S%H4325>water<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%>, when ye came <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and because they <S%H7936>hired<s%> against thee <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1160>Beor<s%> from <S%H6604>Pethor<s%> of <S%H763>Mesopotamia<s%>, to curse <S%H7043>thee<s%>.

Nevertheless <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H14>would<s%> not <S%H8085>hearken<s%> unto <S%H1109>Balaam<s%>; but <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H2015>turned<s%> the <S%H7045>curse<s%> into a <S%H1293>blessing<s%> unto <S%H3068>thee<s%>, because Jehovah thy <S%H430>God<s%> loved <S%H157>thee<s%>.
Thou shalt not <S%H1875>seek<s%> their <S%H7965>peace<s%> nor their <S%H2896>prosperity<s%> all thy <S%H3117>days<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>.

Thou shalt not <S%H8581>abhor<s%> an <S%H130>Edomite<s%>; for he is thy <S%H251>brother<s%>: thou shalt not <S%H8581>abhor<s%> an <S%H4713>Egyptian<s%>, because thou wast a <S%H1616>sojourner<s%> in his <S%H776>land<s%>.
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H1755>generation<s%> that are <S%H3205>born<s%> unto them shall <S%H935>enter<s%> into the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
When thou goest <S%H3318>forth<s%> in <S%H4264>camp<s%> against thine <S%H341>enemies<s%>, then thou shalt <S%H8104>keep<s%> thee from every <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%>.

If there be among you any <S%H376>man<s%>, that is not <S%H2889>clean<s%> by reason of that which <S%H7137>chanceth<s%> him by <S%H3915>night<s%>, then shall he <S%H3318>go<s%> <S%H2351>abroad<s%> out of the <S%H4264>camp<s%>, he shall not <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H8432>within<s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%>:

but it shall <S%H6153>be<s%>, when evening cometh <S%H6437>on<s%>, he shall <S%H7364>bathe<s%> himself in <S%H4325>water<s%>; and when the <S%H8121>sun<s%> is <S%H935>down<s%>, he shall <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H8432>within<s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%>.
Thou shalt have a place <S%H3027>also<s%> <S%H2351>without<s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%>, whither thou shalt go <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H2351>abroad<s%>:

and thou shalt have a <S%H3489>paddle<s%> among thy <S%H240>weapons<s%>; and it shall <S%H3427>be<s%>, when thou sittest down <S%H2351>abroad<s%>, thou shalt <S%H2658>dig<s%> <S%H7725>therewith<s%>, and shalt turn back and <S%H3680>cover<s%> that which cometh from <S%H6627>thee<s%>:

for <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1980>walketh<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of thy <S%H4264>camp<s%>, to <S%H5337>deliver<s%> <S%H5414>thee<s%>, and to give up thine <S%H341>enemies<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H4264>thee<s%>; therefore shall thy camp be <S%H6918>holy<s%>, that he may not <S%H7200>see<s%> an <S%H6172>unclean<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> in <S%H7725>thee<s%>, and turn away from <S%H310>thee<s%>.
Thou shalt not <S%H5462>deliver<s%> unto his <S%H113>master<s%> a <S%H5650>servant<s%> that is <S%H5337>escaped<s%> from his master unto <S%H113>thee<s%>:

he shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> with <S%H7130>thee<s%>, in the midst of <S%H4725>thee<s%>, in the place which he shall <S%H977>choose<s%> within <S%H259>one<s%> of thy <S%H8179>gates<s%>, where it pleaseth him <S%H2896>best<s%>: thou shalt not oppress <S%H3238>him<s%>.
There shall be no <S%H6948>prostitute<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, neither shall there be a <S%H6945>sodomite<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

Thou shalt not <S%H935>bring<s%> the <S%H868>hire<s%> of a <S%H2181>harlot<s%>, or the <S%H4242>wages<s%> of a <S%H3611>dog<s%>, into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> for any <S%H5088>vow<s%>: for even <S%H8147>both<s%> these are an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>.

Thou shalt not lend upon <S%H5391>interest<s%> to thy <S%H251>brother<s%>; <S%H5391>interest<s%> of <S%H3701>money<s%>, <S%H5392>interest<s%> of <S%H400>victuals<s%>, <S%H5392>interest<s%> of <S%H1697>anything<s%> that is lent upon <S%H5391>interest<s%>:

unto a <S%H5237>foreigner<s%> thou mayest lend upon <S%H5391>interest<s%>; but unto thy <S%H251>brother<s%> thou shalt not lend upon <S%H5391>interest<s%>, that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> may <S%H1288>bless<s%> thee in all that thou <S%H4916>puttest<s%> thy <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H776>unto<s%>, in the land whither thou <S%H935>goest<s%> in to possess <S%H3423>it<s%>.

When thou shalt <S%H5087>vow<s%> a <S%H5088>vow<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>, thou shalt not be <S%H309>slack<s%> to <S%H7999>pay<s%> <S%H3068>it<s%>: for Jehovah thy <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H1875>surely<s%> <S%H1875>require<s%> it of <S%H2399>thee<s%>; and it would be sin in thee.
But if thou shalt <S%H2308>forbear<s%> to <S%H5087>vow<s%>, it shall be no sin in <S%H2399>thee<s%>.

That which is gone <S%H4161>out<s%> of thy <S%H8193>lips<s%> thou shalt <S%H8104>observe<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%>; according as thou hast <S%H5087>vowed<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>, a <S%H5071>freewill-offering<s%>, which thou hast <S%H1696>promised<s%> with thy <S%H6310>mouth<s%>.

When thou <S%H935>comest<s%> into thy <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>'s <S%H3754>vineyard<s%>, then thou mayest <S%H398>eat<s%> of <S%H6025>grapes<s%> thy <S%H7648>fill<s%> at thine own <S%H5315>pleasure<s%>; but thou shalt not <S%H5414>put<s%> any in thy <S%H3627>vessel<s%>.

When thou <S%H935>comest<s%> into thy <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>'s standing <S%H7054>grain<s%>, then thou mayest <S%H6998>pluck<s%> the <S%H4425>ears<s%> with thy <S%H3027>hand<s%>; but thou shalt not <S%H5130>move<s%> a <S%H2770>sickle<s%> unto thy <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>'s standing <S%H7054>grain<s%>.
